Posts.Title: NERVE DAMAGE post RP

Posts.Content: My penile nerves got really screwed up from the operation, even though it is supposed to have been "nerve sparing". I am wondering now, at 18 months, if there are any new techniques to help them heal? Like over the counter supplements, gene therapy, exercises you can do??? anyone have any ideas. I do not want to have Trimix injections as the only solution for the rest of my life.
Posts.Title: NERVE DAMAGE post RP

Posts.Content: been using trimx for a year, but I do not like the needle at all. Also, sometimes I end up with a 3 hour boner, which is not fun either. I was HOPING for being able to get hard enough for intercourse with just 100 mg Viagra and manual stimulation.
Posts.Title: NERVE DAMAGE post RP

Posts.Content: I know what you mean. I do not get a headache, but do feel like a "rush of blood" to my head with the Viagra. It lasts maybe 5 minutes, not unpleasant...just weird.
Posts.Title: vaigra booster?

Posts.Content: I have been taking CLA for fat loss...just started it. CLA is Conjugated Lineolic Acid. I had 2 mg of CLA this morning, and a little later took my 100 mg of Viagra. I swear that the combined effect of the two was stronger than normal. Like a 25% boost to the effect of the Viagra by itself. anyone else taking CLA and Viagra? Did you notice the same?
Posts.Title: vaigra booster?

Posts.Content: well, the CLA I am taking is just safflower oil that was slightly modified...so I am not too worried about it doing something weird. The Viagra does make may head feel a little funny, but that is about it as far as undesired side effects. Like anything, everyone has his own tolerance level. Did my head feel extra funny with the CLA + Viagra....maybe a little worse, but if that is what it takes to get a hard on....I can take it! lol Before the prostate cancer I used to take Cialis with no side effects, but at a low dosage. My quest is to find something, other than a giant needle stuck into my penis, that can get me laid again, so any boost to the Viagra (which works marginally in me) is welcome

I really dread having to stick that needle in!

Posts.Content: I think a month may be fine. it does take a while for things to heal up down there. do not want to be stressing some find sutures or something too early. You can start taking tiny Viagra doses right away though.
Posts.Title: How long after surgery does one need to wait to try the pump?

Posts.Content: yep, mine shrunk for sure. maybe up to an inch. but when erect, it seems the normal length, so it is more like a turtle keeping its head inside the shell. I guess I just learned to live with it. there ARE penis stretchers, that are supposed to add an inch or two to the length. But they looked like medieval torture devices to me, so I never took them seriously. there is also a technique called Jelqing that is supposed to help lengthen and thicken the penis. But I also saw some warnings that Jelquing could be dangerous, and since I had an operation...I did not want to over exert the poor fellow.
Posts.Title: Shrinkage following DaVinci
